item.title: One Dollar Too Many
item.description: One Dollar Too Many is a 1968 Spaghetti Western feature film directed by Enzo G. Castellari and starring Antonio Sabàto, John Saxon, and Frank Wolff.

item.title: Few Dollars for Django
item.description: A Few Dollars for Django is a 1966 Spaghetti Western film directed by León Klimovsky and Enzo G. Castellari and starring Anthony Steffen. Although credited only to León Klimovsky, A Few Dollars for Django was predominately directed by an uncredited Enzo G. Castellari.

item.title: Bullet in the Flesh
item.description: Bullet in the Flesh or Il piombo e la carne is a 1964 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Marino Girolami.

item.title: Black Eagle of Santa Fe
item.description: The Black Eagle of Santa Fe or Die Schwarzen Adler von Santa Fe is a 1965 West German and Italian international co-production western film directed by Alberto Cardone and Ernst Hofbauer.

item.title: The Hellbenders
item.description: The Hellbenders is a 1967 Spaghetti Western directed by Sergio Corbucci.

item.title: Renegade Riders
item.description: Renegade Riders is an Italian spaghetti western film. It represents the official film debut for director Enzo G. Castellari of Few Dollars for Django. The film stars Edd Byrnes and Guy Madison.

item.title: Johnny Hamlet
item.description: Johnny Hamlet, also known as The Wild and the Dirty, is a 1968 Italian film directed by Enzo G. Castellari. The film is a Spaghetti Western version of William Shakespeare's tragedy Hamlet.

item.title: Reverend's Colt
item.description: Reverend's Colt is a 1970 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western directed by León Klimovsky.

item.title: Jonathan of the Bears
item.description: Jonathan degli orsi is a 1993 Italian spaghetti western film directed by Enzo G. Castellari. It was coproduced and filmed in Russia, where it was released as Месть - белого индейца.

item.title: Between God
item.description: Between God, the Devil and a Winchester is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Marino Girolami. The story is based on Treasure island by Robert Louis Stevenson..
